body.name: Modern Nightstand with Charging Station and Drawer,3-Tier Side Table End Table for Living Room,Bedroom,Narrow Sofa Table Bedside Table with Storage Shelf for Small Spaces-Starry Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs
features: 1.【Nightstand with Drawer】As compact as it is,the nightstand provide great surface storage with 3 shelves and one wooden drawer.The drawer not sag down when pulled out because it's on rails to hold in place.with large storage space,keep your essentials from being scattered,wood drawers are also durable than fabric.

2.【End Table with Charging Station】Tired of always having to find plug in in back of bed?the side table comes with 2 AC outlets,2 USB ports and a 6.5ft power cord for your charging needs,you can charge cellphone,Mac,iPad and other devices more easily,charging stabler and efficiency,no damage to your devices,convenient and useful.

3.【Multifunction End Table】Overall dimension:25.2"H x 15.7"W x 11.8"L,the end table just the right size and is a good addition to furniture,it can be used as sofa side table,end table,nightstand,bedside table,writing desk or put it in other small spaces,drawer size:3.5"H x 11.4"W x 9.8"L.

4.【Sturdy,Stable and Durable】The night stand is made of high-quality wood board and rigid metal frame provides excellent stability and durability,with 4 adjustable footpads to ensure sturdy in different scenarios

5.【Assemble was a Breeze】The side table is extremely easy to put together,all the parts were labeled and coordinated with the instructions,the directions were simply and easy to follow,you can assemble it within 20 minutes.

6.【Service and Support】One year quality guarantee,if you have any questions about this small side table, please feel free to contact us,our professional customer service team will get back to you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed for my son's small room
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice little night stand and just the right size for a small room. It was easy to assemble and it very sturdy. I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my husband and was very easy to assemble and very sturdy too. He loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They work as intended
reviews.reviewText: I bought two at the same time, but they both were slightly different from each other. They each had different assembly for the drawer. One of them has like, a soft close feature, and the other one just slams open and shut. One of them came with an Allen wrench that didn’t even fit, it was too small. They’re pretty good quality overall, but the assembly was a little annoying. The power cord is long, so that is nice. My daughters love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What I needed
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect size draw for what I needed in my room. Assembling was easy. With a help of another person it took less than 20 minutes. All tools it's provided, easy step by step directions, all the screws and tools are separated with clear labels. You really can't do wrong with this. If I had a bigger space I would've gotten another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Wrong Pieces, 5 tables and only 1 has been correct
reviews.reviewText: Like others have commented, the drawer is one of the last pieces to put together if you follow the instructions and low and behold the 'C' screws for the front of the drawer were not long enough to reach the 'D' receivers. So all that time wasted. Another nice lady posted a video so you can see. Ordered 2, one is still on the way, and in the process of a replacment for this one. We'll see if the parts are correct on the other 2, but I'm not getting my hopes up. I'll update the review if the problem is remedied with the replacement and 2nd stand.**update 12/5 the second stand arrived so I started with the drawer and once again the screws were not long enough. So either they are sending the wrong parts or they have drilled out the holes on the drawer sides in the wrong spot.**update 12/13 the THIRD table finally came with the correct pieces. So I'm attempting yet again to buy another matching piece and see if it will come correct since I know it's possible. It's upsetting that I originally bought them on sale and can no longer get that price after all the headaches it's caused to get even ONE correct item. So beware, if your hardware doesn't come in the red bag, individually packaged it's probably incorrect. If your cam lock bolts are silver, they are incorrect, they need to be the black/brown set.**Update 12/26 The 4th table came. I checked the parts and though the table looks the same it came with a completely different set of drawer parts. This one had wooden dowls and brackets instead of cam locks. I decided to give it a go but found that the drawer guides were incorrect. They were ball bearing glides, already installed on the inside panels of the table itself, and could not be taken apart to install the proper piece to the drawer itself. So here we are returning this table yet again, after having assembled 90% of the table. Some day I'll have matching tables. and if the company had any decency I'd be refunded for the hassle.**Update 1/10...wrong again, so after sending back 5 tables & keeping the ONE correct table, I'm done...I initiated a refund for this table because I'm tired of wasting my time checking and finding the wrong parts and then having to find time to drop it off for an Amazon return. I'll find tables somewhere else and donate the current one I have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wrong fastener package was included
reviews.reviewText: I really like the table itself with the drawer, shelves and outlets for USBs and electric. The size is good for my use.My complaint is with the packet of screws, cams, pins etc. The wrong one was included.The cams and pins were too small causing us to purchase the correct size from the local hardware store (not reimbursed by Amazon) and the screws had a sharp point instead of the blunt tip pictured causing the tips to crack the surface of the table.My options were to return it for a refund or return it for a replacement. Either way it meant a complete deconstruction and putting all the various 20 some parts back in the small box it came in. I’m not that good at puzzles. And could I be sure I wouldn’t have the same problem if I exchanged it?Lesson learned: Do more than a quick count to make sure it’s all there like I did but closely compare the fasteners to the inventory pictures that comes with the product to make sure they’re the right size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice night stand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect storage for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: Using as an end table next to a rocker. Convenient for storing remotes, holding cup of coffee and charging your devices without taking up valuable space. Highly recommend. Looks nice and sturdy
